articles.author: Melissa Rudy
articles.title: Drinking alcohol is linked to six types of cancer, experts say: ‘It’s toxic’ - Fox News
articles.description: More than 5% of all cancer cases are caused by drinking alcohol, according to a new report from the American Association for Cancer Research. An addition specialist discusses the risk.
